comments.html:
Thanks a million for pointing this out.

I had that link in a half-dozen places, so it was a bit of a whack-a-mole exercise to remove it everywhere ;) Anyway, it should be fixed now.
comments.name: Ivan Pepelnjak

comments.html:
The link to the feed at the top of the side bar points to an old version without HTTPS http: //feed.ipspace.net/blog/.

Should probably be https://blog.ipspace.net/atom.xml
comments.name: Andy
